name: Poly The Run
description:
COLLECT COINS
Collect enough coins to get to the next level!

AVOID OBSTACLES
Go around obstacles carefully, this cruel world does not forgive mistakes. Only one life. Only hardcore.

COMPLETE ALL LEVELS
You must pass all 5 levels. This will help you buttons that appear at the bottom when collecting the required number of coins

DEFEAT THE ENEMY
The enemy creates obstacles behind them. Also sometimes he drops arrows. Collect them to win!
